name: Weather Web Application
desc: Developed using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack. Using the OpenWeather API to retrieve weather information.

name: Police Feedback System
desc: Facilitates citizen feedback on police services in Rajasthan. Utilized sm2p Library for OTP Management for email and SMS verification.

name: Spotify Web Page
desc: Utilized HTML for structuring the web page, ensuring a visually appealing and responsive layout
